TopicTitle: Craft Has Too Many Parts - VAB Level 3

Articles.Content:
Hello All,

 

I recently got KSP on Xbox, and I've had a problem. I'm getting the message that my craft cannot be launched, as it exceeds 30 parts. However, my VAB is fully upgraded, and I am in Science Mode. What should I do to fix this?
Welcome to the forum and sorry to hear about your problem, @defaultstatus1, your question has been moved here from gameplay questions as it seems to be a support issue.

Hmmm...

 

I quit to main menu, launched via spaceplane hangar, reverted, and switched to VAB to launch. Things are working fine currently.

Same problem as here:

It seems to fix itself.
I've heard from a few Xboxers that it is an issue with the last update not installing properly until you restart your system. So turn it off, and then back on again.

I got this on modded PC, but with the SPH. Completely unsure what's up with my game.
